production.toolProfile: key-to-a-toolProfile existing in dispatch .config -> could refer to any structure or to an existing cid (dispatch either understands 'ipld:existingtoolcid' or just publishes the whole structure and links it as a new toolLink)

plus_comm.content: forall M N K, nat K -> plus M N K -> plus N M K

plus_succ.content: forall M N K, plus M N K -> plus M (s N) (s K)

content: Define nat : nat -> prop by nat zero ; nat (succ N) := nat N
Define plus : nat -> nat -> nat -> prop by plus z N N ; plus (s M) N (s K) := plus M N K
